thread.title: Giannis Antetokounmpo throws down FT line dunk
thread.title_full: Giannis Antetokounmpo throws down FT line dunk

author: USA TODAY
title: Giannis Antetokounmpo throws down FT line dunk
text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo throws down FT line dunk Another crazy highlight for the Greek Freak. Post to Facebook Giannis Antetokounmpo throws down FT line dunk Another crazy highlight for the Greek Freak.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/giannis-antekounmpo-free-throw-line-bucks-dunk-athleticism-crazy-space-jam-what-how-greek-freak/   Giannis Antetokounmpo throws down FT line dunk Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 9:41   
The Greek Freak is crazy. (Photo: NBA) 
Here's Giannis Antetokounmpo doing Giannis Antetokounmpo things . 
On Saturday night, the Greek Freak looked just like Michael Jordan in Space Jam . He takes off from just inside the free-throw line, but when you slow it down and look at where he took his last dribble - it's almost more impressive than a free-throw line dunk. Actually, I think it is more impressive. Looks like #Giannis watched Space Jam before his game today! pic.twitter.com/OWgWEalxtw — NBA (@NBA) February 12, 2017 
Let's break this down a bit: 
At full speed in an actual game, he picks up his last dribble here - outside the 3-point line. 
Then, he takes his last step outside the circle… 
…which takes him a step inside the free-throw line, where he takes off and flies all the way to the hoop. 
Absolutely ridiculous. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/giannis-antekounmpo-free-throw-line-bucks-dunk-athleticism-crazy-space-jam-what-how-greek-freak/ Most Popular
